briefTitle: Study to Evaluate Immunogenicity and Safety of GlaxoSmithKline (GSK) Biologicals' Quadrivalent Influenza Vaccine GSK2282512A When Administered to Children 6 to 35 Months of Age
officialTitle: Immunogenicity and Safety Study of GSK Biologicals' Quadrivalent Influenza Vaccine (GSK2282512A) When Administered in Children
summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the immunogenicity, reactogenicity and safety of the new influenza vaccine GSK2282512A (FLU-Q-QIV) and compare its activity to the marketed vaccine FluarixÂ® (TIV) in young children 6 to 35 months of age.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Seroconverted Subjects for Anti- Haemagglutination Inhibition (HI) Antibodies Against Each of the Four Vaccine Influenza Strains of Quadrivalent Influenza GSK2282512A Vaccine.
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: At Day 28 for primed subjects and at Day 56 for unprimed subjects
